Name: Infinite
Desc:
Creates a place where countless Ether Swords are produced. Ether Swords only move near Adele, and follows Adele when moving out of range to track down a new enemy.
Ether Swords created from Infinite aren't affected by Gathering/Blossom and are only affected by Grave.
Ether Swords do not affect enemies in the Damage Reflection status and only tracks down enemies when Adele is in combat.
Required Skill: Lv. 20 Grave or above

H.Old:
MP Cost: 1000. Invincible while casting or canceling.
Creates 18 Ether Swords which lasts for 30 sec. and attacks at 700% damage 2 times.
When attack hits, there is 5% chance of creating an Ether Crystal.
Cooldown: 180 sec.
